argument.catherder.uuid.format.invalid: %s is of the wrong format should contain 4 dashes
argument.catherder.uuid.section.invalid: %s contains one or more invalid characters
block.catherder.cat_tree.set_owner_help: Shift click with your cat nearby and they will come and make the tree their own. If the unimaginable happens and they do die right click the tree to revive them.
cat.gender.female.subject: she
cat.gender.female.title: girl
cat.gender.male.subject: he
cat.gender.male.title: boy
cat.mode.attack.description: In this mode your cat will follow you and attack anything that attacks you or that you attack.
cat.mode.docile.description: In this mode your cat will follow you but not attack anything. They are ready for you to throw the toy.
cat.mode.guard.description: Cats follow closely and attack any monsters that come close.
cat.mode.incapacitated.help: %s is incapacitated and requires a cake to revive %s.
cat.mode.patrol.description: In this mode your cat will patrol between 2-4 points (set using a command emblem) and attack monsters that try come into view.
cat.mode.skittish.description: The cat will avoid all other creatures, and sometimes its owner.
cat.mode.tactical.description: In this mode your cat will follow you but will not attack anything unless you use the command beam
cat.mode.wandering.description: In this mode your cat so stay near it's bowl and wait for your next command. To set you cat's bowl bring your cat within a few blocks of it.
catherder.screen.cat.title: Cat Info
catradar.errornoradio: **** Remember to put radio collar on your cat ****
catradar.errorown: **** You do not own %s! Please ensure you have permission to interact with %d! ****
cattree.explain.missing: This item has likely been spawned in directly!
command.catrespawn.imprecise: Too many cats (%d) for this owner under this name, use `byuuid` for %s
commands.catrespawn.uuid.failure: Failed to raise %s from the dead
item.catherder.owner_change.tooltip: Sets ANY cat to be yours
petdoor.explain.missing: This item has likely been spawned in directly!
talent.catherder.bed_finder.description: While a cat with this skill is on your head, your bed will be highlighted in a black outline. To get the cat on you head, right click on them with a bone in hand. The range at which it can do this is equal to 200 blocks per level, but becomes infinite at level 5.
talent.catherder.bird_catcher.descriptio: Every level grants a 10%% chance to make anything your cat kills drop its loot twice, Level 5 grants an extra 10%%, bringing it up to a 60%% chance.
talent.catherder.catlike_reflexes.descri: Increases the chance that your cat, will completely block a physical attack.
talent.catherder.cheetah_speed.descripti: Increases your cat's movement speed while chasing a target and while it is being ridden. Every level grants a 12%% increase, and mastering it grants an additional 15%% increase.
talent.catherder.creeper_sweeper.descrip: A cat with this skill can smell creepers in the area and it will growl to warn you. The range at which your cat, can, detect creepers increases by 6 blocks per level, and mastering this skill will make your cat capable of attacking creepers Your cat will reset the creeper's detonation timer with each attack.
talent.catherder.fisher_cat.description: Whenever your cat enters the water, it may catch a fish which it will give to you when it shakes itself dry The chance of catching a fish increases with level, and any points in HellHound may cause the fish to be pre-cooked. Mastering this skill lets your cat breathe underwater.
talent.catherder.happy_eater.description: Increases the NP your cat gets from food items by 10%% per level. In addition, level 3 lets your cat eat rotten flesh, and level 5 lets your cat eat fish.
talent.catherder.hell_beast.description: Allows your cat set things on fire while attacking. The higher the level, the longer the fire lasts. Mastering the skill grants your cat immunity to fire.
talent.catherder.mount.description: Allows you to ride your cat anywhere at speed. Every level allows your cat to jump higher. To get on your cat have an empty hand and jump and click on the cat to get on it.
talent.catherder.nermal.description: This skill will cause your cat to warm the heart of any villager, prompting the villager to give you presents! Higher levels in the skill increase the quality of the random gifts. This can only be done once every two Minecraft days. Mastering the skill allows you to do this once every Minecraft day.
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.1.line.1: Villager: Cute cat! Take good care of %s.
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.2.line.3: Yes you are! And a good %s gotta eat!
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.3.line.1: Villager: Oh my goodness! Where did you get that little bundle
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.3.line.2: of happiness and loyalty? Here, take this
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.3.line.3: iron, make some gear, keep your buddy safe!
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.4.line.1: Villager: I think my heart just grew beyond the
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.4.line.2: size of my nose. Here, take this.
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.5.line.1: Villager: I'd just like to tell you that you have
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.5.line.2: the bestest cat in the universe!
talent.catherder.nermal.msg.5.line.3: And also to give you a diamond!
talent.catherder.pack_cat.description: Each level gives your cat 3 inventory slots in its, Pack Cat GUI. At level 5, your cat will, also automatically pick up any nearby items if, it has space in its inventory.
talent.catherder.pest_fighter.descriptio: Inflicts 1 point of damage on all nearby silverfish at random Increasing the skill level increases the range by 3 blocks and mastering the skill doubles the damage.
talent.catherder.poison_fang.description: Your cat's attacks will poison their target, and the poison's duration increases with level. At level 3 your cat becomes immune to poison, and mastering this skill allows you to cleanse yourself of all potion effects, including poison, by right-clicking on your cat with a spider eye, at the cost of 30 NP.
talent.catherder.quick_healer.descriptio: Improves the rate at which your cat heals without needing to rest Mastering the skill will heal your cat 50%% faster when sitting.
talent.catherder.rescue_cat.description: If you're at critical health and a cat with this skill is following you, it will attempt to heal you half a heart per level in this skill, at the cost of 100 NP Mastering this skill reduces the cost to 80 NP.
talent.catherder.tomcat.description: Improves critical hit rate 1/2 a heart for every level plus an extra heart when you master it.
treat.catherder.normal_treat.max_level: Your cat is too high level to gain anything from these treats.
treat.catherder.normal_treat.too_young: This cat's a bit too young to be learning skills just yet.
treat.catherder.wild_treat.low_level: Your cat can't possibly handle the awesome power contained in these treats.
treat.catherder.wild_treat.max_level: CONGRATULATIONS! Your cat has reached the ultimate level!
treat.catherder.wild_treat.too_young: This cat's a bit too young to be learning skills just yet.
